--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Cliffjumper arrived and Transformed. "Well?" He asked. Beachcomber
> looked caught off guard. "Well, this is Redhot, i'm not to sure 
where
> she's from, but she needed help." he exclaimed.
> 
> Cliffjumper looked up to Redhot, then eyed her up and down. "Why is 
a
> Seeker wearing Autobot symbols?" He asked, his eyes narrowing.

::REDHOT::

    Redhot's smile faded and he eyed Cliffjumper warily. He quickly 
ran his eyes over the smaller Autobot.
    (Female?) he thought (Blast..I knew I should have changed the
body 
when I had the chance.) He thought. (I always get this from people. 
I'm male, damn it!). He let out another Starscream sounding groan.
How 
he hated explaining himself EVERY time.
    "I'm... not..local." the Seeker said. His red eyes twinkled
slyly. 
"I'm male. I j..just look androgenous. And why...I...I'm not 
wearing... 'Con symbols is m...my business." He clanged his chest 
firmly, careful not to injure his cockpit further.
"Beachcomber...your 
friend...was kind e..enough to rescue me." 
    He broke into a caughing fit. When he managed to subdue it, he 
patiently waited for the new Autobot's response.

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions

********************************
